value.title: Deep dive on how to create Power BI themes with a JSON file
value.excerpt: You can customize the look and feel of the Power BI reports using the formatting pane for each specific visual or you can speed up the process by using a JSON file. value.title: How to create functions in Power Query

value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
value.excerpt: By default, column headings are only displayed in your reports if they contain data.
